title: Midnight Bloom Silk Blouse
image_prompt: high-detail flat-lay product render of a women's silk blouse, deep midnight blue color with subtle floral jacquard pattern, long sleeves with slight puff at shoulders, mandarin collar neckline, concealed button placket, curved hem, isolated on plain white background, visible fine stitching and silk sheen, no model, no mannequin, no human elements
sleeves: Long sleeves with slight puff at shoulders
techpack: Tailored silk blouse with jacquard floral weave, mandarin collar, concealed button placket, puffed long sleeves, curved hem. Fabric: 100% mulberry silk, 80gsm, pre-shrunk. Buttons: mother-of-pearl, 10mm diameter. Stitching: single needle lockstitch, matching thread.
provenance: Inspired by traditional silk weaving techniques and contemporary commercial womenswear trends
